Detailed Description

The LocalSwarm has a local neighbourhood for each indivdiual.

The neighbourhood best is used to update the current velocity. The neighbourhood size in both directions is given as a parameter.
An extra storage is maintained, where the index of the iteration best bird for each bird is stored. The iteration best is determined by comparing personal best positions and is only used for updating, not explicitly passed on, as in the RingSwarm.

Constructor setting up the swarm.

Parameters:
pso_p  The PSO Algorithm for the parameters used
size_in  The swarm size
dim  The dimension of the search space, i.e. the function to be optimized
min_x  Lower bound of x dimension, x0 chosen randomly
max_x  Upper bound of x dimension, x0 chosen randomly
min_v  Lower bound of v dimension, v0 chosen randomly
max_v  Upper bound of v dimension, v0 chosen randomly
nSize_in  The size of the neighbourhood to the left and right, nSize=1 means 1 to the left and to the right
swapDelay  A swap is only allowed every swapDelay steps -- not used yet

Member Function Documentation

int LocalSwarm::step ( int  steps = 1  )  [virtual]

The Localswarm does steps steps.

Within one iteration the following actions are done for all the birds.
The current position is evaluated and within each neighbourhood the iteration best bird is determined.
Then the current velocity is adjusted to the neighbourhood best bird and the birds are moved.

Reimplemented from Swarm.

Here is the call graph for this function:

void LocalSwarm::compareLocal (  )  [protected]

For each bird all the birds in the neighbourhood, including himself, are compared.

The index of each best one is stored in iterationBestBirds

Here is the call graph for this function:

void LocalSwarm::updateVel (  )  [protected, virtual]

The velocities of the birds are updated.

Each bird updates its velocity according to the neighbourhood best bird, whose index is stored in iterationBestBirds

Reimplemented from Swarm.

bool LocalSwarm::swapEnabled [protected]

Controls whether in the current step a swap is allowed.

int LocalSwarm::swapDelay [protected]

A swap is only allowed every swapDelay steps.

int LocalSwarm::nSize [protected]

The neighbourhood size, i.e. the numbers of birds to left and right.

Total number of neighbours. nSize of 2, is one to the left and one to the right

int* LocalSwarm::iterationBestBirds [protected]

The index of the neighbourhood best bird of the current iteration.

This bird is only used for the velocity update, it is not used for further comparsion with neighbouring birds. Thus the momentary global best position is not passed on
